channel.title: Talks on Owais Lone
channel.description: Recent content in Talks on Owais Lone

item.title: From TC 90 to Python
item.description: This Saturday I’ll be delivering a workshop on the Python programming language in my college. Our university has an age old course for Computer Engineering. C is the introductory language and is taught using the Turbo C compiler from the 90s, VB 6 is considered the best way to make GIUs. It’s time to introduce my friends to 2010 in Computer Science. If this goes well, Django or PyGTK will be next.
